posts.title: Boobs Ice Luge
posts.content: Take some shooters from these hooters! Nothing goes down the hatch smoother than vanilla vodka shooting out of an ice luge except a delicious shot from a perfectly formed icy booby. It sounds too good to be true — but it is so, so true.

posts.title: The Gift Of Nothing
posts.content: This holiday season give “the gift of nothing” to those who truly deserve it. Whether it’s a former lover, an evil boss, or just a spoiled little brat child, the gift of nothing will show how much you care and how much effort you’ve put into giving them something really special.

posts.title: Moon Shaped Lantern
posts.content: Awe at the beauty of a full moon every night by lighting up your room with this moon shaped lantern. This gorgeous lantern emits a soft golden glow ideal for accent lighting in any room and comes in seven different sizes.

posts.title: The Scale Of Things Book
posts.content: The Scale of Things is the incredibly intriguing read that will change how you view the world around you. It brings together facts and figures in a scientific yet visually captivating way – embracing popular topics covering everything from science to geography to politics.

posts.title: Minimalist Travel Wallet
posts.content: Keep important documents safe and at hand while you trot the globe using this minimalist travel wallet. This genuine leather wallet is designed to securely carry everything from credit cards to boarding passes and passports while still maintaining a slim profile.

posts.title: Scanmarker Digital Highlighter
posts.content: Increase your productivity by creating projects and reports in record time the Scanmarker digital highlighter. Simply slide this handheld scanning pen across a line of printed text and watch it appear instantly on your computer screen!

posts.title: Tactical Self Defense Pen
posts.content: Be prepared for anything the world throws your way with the tactical self defense pen in your pocket. Apart from its patented waterproof ink, the pen features a glass breaker, handcuff key, and even a self defense tool that collects an attacker’s DNA sample.

posts.title: Giant Allium Giganteum Flower Seeds
posts.content: Watch your garden take on an other-worldly appearance once these giant allium giaganteum flower seeds bloom. Upon blooming, the tall and sturdy green stock gives way to a cluster of small colored flowers that combine to form a giant and incredibly beautiful flower sphere.

posts.title: My Ex-Wife’s Wedding Dress
posts.content: When Kevin Cotter’s wife left him, she took everything except her wedding dress. In Kevin’s infinite wisdom, he took it upon himself to find 101 uses for his ex-wife’s wedding dress – with everything from using it as a car sponge to a fishing net in this hilarious book.

posts.title: Easy Sushi Roller
posts.content: Forming tight, perfectly shaped rolls is easier than ever when you have this easy sushi roller. It allows you to quickly roll up elegant professional looking rolls in one fluid motion – making this portable appliance great for beginners and pros alike.

posts.title: 10-in-1 Emergency Survival Gear Kit
posts.content: Keep an ace up your sleeve in the event the unthinkable occurs by packing this 10-in-1 emergency survival gear kit. This compact kit houses a multitude of must-have tools for survival like a flint stone, a compass, a multi-function knife and much more.

posts.title: The Space Candle
posts.content: If you’ve ever wondered what outer space smelled like, the space candle was made for you! This 16 oz. 100% soy wax candle’s unique scent attempts to reproduce what space smells like based on first hand accounts from the astronauts who’ve been there.
